monsters.name: Ancient Black Dragon
monsters.senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 26
monsters.damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
monsters.condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d10 + 8) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d6 + 8) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +15 to hit, reach 20 ft ., one target. Hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales acid in a 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw, taking 67 (15d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reactions.name: Amphibious
reactions.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.

reactions.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
reactions.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 ft. of the dragon must succeed on a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw or take 15 (2d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

spells: The dragon is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). The archmage can cast disguise self and invisibility at will and has the following wizard spells prepared

spells.Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation, shocking grasp

spells.1st level (4 slots): detect magic, identify, mage armor*, magic missile

spells.2nd level (3 slots): detect thoughts, mirror image, misty step

spells.5th level (3 slots): cone of cold, scrying, wall of force

spells: * The archmage casts these spells on itself before combat.

abilities_top.name: Sound Imitation
abilities_top.desc: The dragon can mimic any sound it has heard. It must succeed at a <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>compendium/skills.md#Deception|Deception<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> check with a +4 circumstance bonus to do so.

abilities_mid.name: Wing Deflection
abilities_mid.desc: ⬲ __Trigger__ The dragon is targeted with an attack. __Effect__  The dragon raises its wing, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the dragon is Flying, it descends 10 feet after the attack is complete.

abilities_bot.name: Breath Weapon
abilities_bot.desc: ⬺ (<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>arcane<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>electricity<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>evocation<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>);  The dragon breathes lightning that deals 9d12 (9d12) electricity damage in a 100-foot line (DC 33 basic Reflex save). It can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 (1d4) rounds.

abilities_bot.name: Desert Thirst
abilities_bot.desc: (<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>arcane<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>transmutation<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>);  When casting create water, the dragon can attempt to destroy liquid instead of creating it, turning an equal amount of liquid into sand. This destroys liquid magic or alchemical items if they're of a lower level than the dragon (a creature can attempt a DC 32 Will save to protect all liquids in its possession). This doesn't affect the liquids in a creature's body.

abilities_bot.name: Draconic Frenzy
abilities_bot.desc: ⬺  The dragon makes two claw <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Strike|Strikes<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> and one horns <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Strike<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> in any order.

abilities_bot.name: Draconic Momentum
abilities_bot.desc: The dragon recharges its Breath Weapon whenever it scores a critical hit with a <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Strike<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>.

spellcasting.name: Arcane Innate Spells
spellcasting.desc: DC 33; __Cantrips (6th)__ <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>ghost-sound|ghost sound<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>; __1st__ <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>create-water|create water<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> at will; see desert thirst; __6th__ <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>illusory-creature|illusory creature<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>illusory-object|illusory object<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>ventriloquism<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> (at will);
